text: fatrkhm yakhuduu fi batlhm, wayaleabuu fi dnyahm hataa yulaquu yawm alqiamat aladhi yueadun fih baledhab, yawm yakhrujun min alqubur msreyn, kama kanuu fi aldunya ydhhbwn 'iilaa alihatuhum alati akhtlqwha llebadt min dun allh, yhrwlwn wysrewn, dhlylt 'absaruhum mnksrt 'iilaa alard, tghshahm alhqart walmhant, dhlk hu alyawm aldhy waeadwana bih fi aldnya, wakanuu bih yhzwwn wyukadhdhibwn
